title: peerwallet
author: peerwallet
content: Hello guys, so we are doing some extensive research on what works in different countries, but most interestingly, this is better when you hear this from people who stay in these Countries.What are you Country's Banking challenges? Some can do instant Bank to Bank transfer while others can't, how does it work in your Country?

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: India Russia and Turkey are the countries has the poorest payment system and so many others countries.

comments.author: roksana.hee
comments.body: India, Pakistan, Russia, Turkey, Nigeria, Philippines, and Nepal are the countries has the poorest payment system as so many other countries.
